A couple of points: If there aren't at least 3 people interested in 
participating in this monthly contest, I'm against it.  I do have some 
ideas for some themes (scenario creator decides which side of the 
conflict to put each team on): 

1)the final battle between King Arthur and Mordred (after the snake 
attacked one soldier) - scenario creator decides which side to put the 
team on

2)the fall of Troy - putting a trojan horse inside would be nice

I'm not going to be a dictator about themes; it should be a decision 
of the group.  Earliest it could start would be May to give us time to 
work out details.
